org.zaproxy.zap.extension.users

Class ExtensionUserManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.parosproxy.paros.extension.ExtensionAdaptor
      • org.zaproxy.zap.extension.users.ExtensionUserManagement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extension, ContextDataFactory, ContextPanelFactory

    public class ExtensionUserManagement
extends ExtensionAdaptor
implements ContextPanelFactory, ContextDataFactory
    The Extension for managing Users, Roles, and related entities.

    This class also handles the loading of AuthenticationMethodType and AuthenticationMethodType classes in the system using the AddOnLoader ( ExtensionFactory.getAddOnLoader()).
